simulate.compoundGrowthInsight: Dikgwebo t≈°a gago di ka hola go feta go fapana ga dikgabane t≈°a gago ka kgolo ya go ati≈°a t≈°helete!
simulate.timeInsight: Ka {{years}} dinyaga, o fa monyaka wa go ati≈°a t≈°helete nako ye e lekanego go ≈°oma.
simulate.contributionInsight: Mo≈°omo wo mobotse! Go nehela ka R{{amount}} kgwedi le kgwedi go go bea tseleng ye e tiilego ya go fihlelela dinyakwa t≈°a gago.
simulate.debtInsight: Go oket≈°a tefo ya gago ka le ge e le bokae bo bongwe bo ka fokot≈°a ka mo go felet≈°ego dikgwedi t≈°a go lefa le go fokot≈°a monyaka wa kakaret≈°o.
simulate.savingsTableHint: T≈°helete ye e Bolokilwego: monyaka wa ngwaga o tloga o oket≈°ega ge t≈°helete e holago (go ati≈°a t≈°helete).

simulate.disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è Ye ke tebanyo e bonolo bakeng sa dinyakwa t≈°a thuto. Dipoelo t≈°a nnete di ka fapana kudu ka lebaka la go fetofetoga ga mmaraka, mefuta le dintlha t≈°e dingwe. Tiro ya kgale ga e tshephat≈°e dipoelo t≈°a bokamoso.
simulate.chartError: Karolo ya t≈°hate e palet≈°we go bont≈°ha. Se se direga gant≈°i ge module ya motheo ya react-native-svg e sa kgokagane/e sa tsenywe mo go ageng ga setlabela. O sa nt≈°i o ka ≈°omi≈°a simulator ntle le t≈°hate.
simulate.chartFixTips: Dikgothalet≈°o t≈°a go loki≈°a: iOS ‚Üí `cd ios && pod install`, gomme o hlweki≈°e & o ageng gape. Android ‚Üí `cd android && ./gradlew clean`, gomme o ageng gape.
simulate.investmentProjectionData: Datha ya Tebanyo ya Go Beakanya T≈°helete

Ka dintlha t≈°a gago t≈°a bjale mo go {{years}} {{yearUnit}}, kakaret≈°o ya gago e tebilwego e tla ba {{total}} ye e lego {{growth}} kgolo ya go ati≈°a t≈°helete.
simulate.scenarioImplication: Se se bolelago: Mokgwa wa {{scenarioName}} o lebant≈°he go lekana le {{returnRate}}% ngwaga le ngwaga ka palogare mo nakong ye e telele, o amogela go fetofetoga ga {{volatility}}.
simulate.scenarioDisclaimer: Dipoelo t≈°a nnete di a fapana; ga se tshephat≈°o. E diri≈°e go kwa kamoo tekanyo le nako di fetolang dipoelo.

compounding.title: Boselamose bja go Gola ga T≈°helete
compounding.description: Ithute ka moo t≈°helete ya gago e ka golago ka gona ka lebelo la godimo ka nako ka maatla a tswala ya kopano.

concept.title: Kgopolo
concept.content: Akanya gore o na le sehlare sa t≈°helete. Tswala ya kopano e swana le go bjala dipeu t≈°eo di welago sehlaring sa gago, gore di gole di be dihlare t≈°e mpsha t≈°a t≈°helete.

coreIdea.title: Kgopolo ya Bohlokwa
coreIdea.content: O hwet≈°a tswala t≈°heleteng ya gago. Gomme o hwet≈°a *tswala tswaleng ya gago*. Ke boselamose bjo.

interactive.title: E Bone e ≈†oma
interactive.content: A re e bone e ≈°oma. Gogela se lahlegago go bona ka moo peelet≈°o ya R10,000 e golago ka gona ka 8% tswala.

quiz.title: Pot≈°i≈°o ya Pela-pela
quiz.question: Ke eng seo se nago le maatla a magolo go kopano?

emergencyFund.title: Letlotlo la Maemo a T≈°hiti≈°ego le Hlalositswe
emergencyFund.description: Lebaka leo o hlokago letlotlo la maemo a t≈°hiti≈°ego le go boloka mang pele o ka peelet≈°a.

why.title: Ke Ka Lebaka Lang?
why.content: Bophelo bo a direga‚Äîgo lahlegelwa ke mo≈°omo, go loki≈°wa ga dikoloi, mekoloto ya kalafo. Letlotlo la maemo a t≈°hiti≈°ego le go thibela go tsena mekolotong (goba go reki≈°a dipeelet≈°o ka nako e mpe).

howMuch.title: Ke Bokae?
howMuch.content: Molao wo o tlwaelegilego: dikgwedi t≈°e 3‚Äì6 t≈°a ditshenyegelo t≈°a bohlokwa. Thoma ka nepo e nyenyane (R5,000‚ÄìR10,000), gomme o age.

interactive.title: Nepo ya Gago
interactive.content: Gogela go beakanya dilo t≈°a bohlokwa t≈°a kgwedi (rente, dijo, dinamelwa). Re tla go bont≈°ha nepo ya maemo a t≈°hiti≈°ego ya dikgwedi t≈°e 3‚Äì6.

quiz.title: Tlhahlobo e Bonako
quiz.question: Letlotlo la maemo a t≈°hiti≈°ego le swanet≈°e go bolokwa kae?

options.volatileStock: Go ETF ya diakhaonte t≈°e di fetogago
options.safeAccount: Go akhaonte e sireletsehilego, e bonolo go e fihlelela

firstPortfolio.title: Go Aga Pothifolio ya Gago ya Mathomo
firstPortfolio.description: Hlama pothifolio ya dipeelet≈°o ye e fapafapanego yeo e swanago le dipakane t≈°a gago le go amogela kotsi.

goals.title: Thoma ka Dipakane
goals.content: Nako + morero = kabo. Dipakane t≈°a nakwana ‚Üí dithoto t≈°e di sireletsehilego. Dipakane t≈°a nako ye telele ‚Üí dithoto t≈°a kgolo e nt≈°i.

diversify.title: Go Fapafapanya
diversify.content: Tswakanya mehuta ya dithoto (diakhaonto, dipanka, t≈°helete) le dinaga gore e tee yeo e lahlegago e se ke ya nt≈°ha sekepe ka moka.

interactive.title: Leka Kabo
interactive.content: ≈†uthi≈°a di-slider t≈°a diakhaonto/dipanka/t≈°helete. Bona phetoho ye e lemogelwago le poelo ya nako ye telele di fetoga ka nako ya nnete.

quiz.title: Tlhahlobo e Bonako
quiz.question: Ke molemo ofe wo mogolo wa go fapafapanya?

options.reduceRisk: Go fokot≈°a kotsi go t≈°wa peelet≈°ong e tee

riskReturn.title: Go Kwe≈°i≈°a Kotsi le Poelo
riskReturn.description: Hwet≈°a kamano gare ga kotsi le dikgonagalo t≈°a poelo go peelet≈°ong.

intro.title: Kotsi ke Eng?
intro.content: Kotsi ke gore peelet≈°o ya gago e ka gola ka moo goba e wa. Kotsi ye kgolo e ka ra poelo ye kgolo ‚Äî eup≈°a gape le go wa go kgolo.

tradeoff.title: Phetoloano
tradeoff.content: Dithoto t≈°e di bolokegilego (bjalo ka t≈°helete) di na le dipoelo t≈°e di tlase. Dithoto t≈°e di kotsing (bjalo ka ditokolot≈°o) di ka gola go feta ka nako eup≈°a di sisinyega go feta.

interactive.title: Kgetha Tsela ya Gago
interactive.content: ≈†uthi≈°a selaedara gare ga "go bolokela" le "kotsi" go bona gore go fapafapana le poelo ya nako ye telele go ka fetoga bjang.

quiz.title: Hlahloba ka Pela
quiz.question: Ke polelo efe yeo e lego nepagalago?

options.A: Dipoelo t≈°e kgolo ka mehla di ra kotsi ye nnyane
options.B: Dipoelo t≈°e kgolo t≈°eo di ka bago gona gant≈°i di tla le kotsi ye kgolo

taxEfficient.title: Go Peelet≈°a ka Mokgwa wa Methelo
taxEfficient.description: Ithute ka diaccount t≈°a go se lefe methelo / t≈°eo di nago le mehola ya methelo le go bea ka bohlale go boloka go feta t≈°a dipoelo t≈°a gago.

wrappers.title: ≈†omi≈°a Segobo
wrappers.content: Diaccount t≈°eo di nago le mehola ya methelo t≈°a go swana le RA, di ≈°irelet≈°a kgolo/dipoelo go methelo t≈°e dingwe.

placement.title: Lefelo la Dithoto
placement.content: Bea dithoto t≈°eo di sa ≈°omego gabotse ka methelo (mohlala, difunds t≈°a bonds, batefelo ba dipoelo t≈°e kgolo) diaccounteng t≈°e di ≈°irelet≈°egago ka methelo pele.

interactive.title: Go Bea ka Bohlale
interactive.content: Gogela difunds go "T≈°e di Lego Methelo" vs "T≈°e di Nago Mehola ya Methelo" dipokete. Bona seelo sa ka morago ga methelo se tokafala.

quiz.title: Hlahloba ka Pela
quiz.question: Ke kgato efe yeo ka tlwaelo e ≈°omago go FETA ka methelo?

options.A: Go swara difunds t≈°a bonds accounteng ye e nago mehola ya methelo
options.B: Go swara difunds t≈°a bonds accounteng ya brokerage ye e nago methelo
